title: Cantor Fitzgerald analysts foresee SEC greenlight for Bitcoin Spot ETFs
description: Cantor Fitzgerald, a preeminent financial services firm, indicates growing confidence in the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approving Bitcoin Spot ETFs, according to a Bloomberg report. This stems from recent revisions made by asset managers to their applications for such funds. Josh Siegler and Will Carlson, research analysts at Cantor Fitzgerald, suggest that the ... Read more

title: Crypto market smashes record with spot trading boom
description: The crypto market just kicked the door down and made its presence known, obliterating records like they were nothing. We’re not just talking about small potatoes here; the seven-day moving average of spot trading volume on major platforms blew past the $24 billion mark on October 26. title: Antminer S21’s profitability examined – Here’s the verdict

title: Anthropic’s deal with Google brings hope to FTX creditors
description: In recent weeks, a consortium of creditors associated with FTX, named the “FTX 2.0 Coalition,” highlighted how the collapsed exchange’s vested interest in Anthropic could substantially impact their compensation. Anthropic, a generative artificial intelligence (AI) company, recently secured a significant funding round of $2 billion from Google. title: VanEck: El Salvador’s Bitcoin adoption to fuel economic renaissance
description: Gabor Gurbacs, a VanEck adviser, believes that El Salvador’s pro-Bitcoin approach might pave the way for it to become the “Singapore of the Americas.” El Salvador, the world’s first country to embrace Bitcoin (BTC) as legal tender, has sparked mixed…

title: BTC ETF speculation sparks meme coin market surge
